name: test_minting_with_insufficient_collateral[plutus_v1]
description:
Test minting a token with a Plutus script with insufficient collateral.

        Expect failure.

        * fund the token issuer and create a UTxO for collateral with insufficient funds
        * check that the expected amount was transferred to token issuer's address
        * mint the token using a Plutus script
        * check that the minting failed because a collateral with insufficient funds was provided
descriptionHtml:
Test minting a token with a Plutus script with insufficient collateral.

    Expect failure.

    * fund the token issuer and create a UTxO for collateral with insufficient funds
    * check that the expected amount was transferred to token issuer's address
    * mint the token using a Plutus script
    * check that the minting failed because a collateral with insufficient funds was provided
statusMessage: Skipped: Plutus is available only in Alonzo+ eras
statusTrace: ('/home/martink/Source/repos/cardano-node-tests3/cardano_node_tests/tests/test_plutus_mint_raw.py', 1688, 'Skipped: Plutus is available only in Alonzo+ eras')

labels.name: tag
labels.value: @pytest.mark.skipif(True, reason='Plutus is available only in Alonzo+ eras')

tags: @pytest.mark.skipif(True, reason='Plutus is available only in Alonzo+ eras')
